name: Generate professional PDF invoices from spreadsheet data
description:
Automatically generate professional PDF invoices from your data. Creates branded PDF invoices with your company logo, client information, line items, and payment details.

What you'll need:
- Invoice data (from spreadsheets, databases, or any source)
- CustomJS account (sign up at customjs.space)
- Your company logo (publicly accessible URL)
- Bank account details for payment information

Your data should include:
- Client name and address
- Invoice number and date
- Line items (description, quantity, price)
- Optional: Client tax ID

Perfect for:
- Freelancers and consultants
- Small businesses
- Agencies sending client invoices
- Automated billing workflows

Get your CustomJS API key at customjs.space/account

Contact: support@customjs.space
